name: Spectrum PD
customPrimary: Hits on fighters have a %s chance to arc to engines, potentially causing a flameout.

name: Corsair Mk.1 Railgun
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor deal %s extra Fragmentation damage.

name: Mini Novaburst Flak Cannon
customPrimary: Fires shells with a proximity fuse that detonates within %s of missiles and fighters.

name: Helsing Flak Rifle
customPrimary: Fires explosive flak shells that detonate within %s of enemy fighters and deal %s High Explosive damage when impacting hull or armour on any ship.

name: Hardlux Beamcannon
customPrimary: Deals hard flux damage to shields. Beam does %s extra Kinetic damage on shield hits.
